content:
# Source Language
English

# Target Language
French

# Target Fragment
crumpled map

# Context
He unfolded it on the hood of the car. <fragment>crumpled map</fragment> Wind threatened to tear the corners.

# Source Language
English

# Target Language
French

# Target Fragment
dim lantern

# Context
The campsite was quiet. <fragment>dim lantern</fragment> Sparks rose from the dying fire.

# Source Language
English

# Target Language
French

# Target Fragment
hurried signature

# Context
She signed the form at the counter. <fragment>hurried signature</fragment> People were lining up behind her.
